description:
Shirou, Saber, Sakura, and Rin all get roped into the chaotic but fun adventures in cooking!

Downloadable content for "Everyday♪ Today's MENU for EMIYA Family."
There are a total of 16 episodes in this additional scenario pack featuring Lancer from the original manga and anime.
Players will enjoy the once peaceful Emiya household with Saber, Sakura, and Rin becoming all the more lively with the inclusion of Lancer.
There will be 2 additional Special Episodes, and Lancer will also be added to Daily Menu, and Memory modes.
name: Everyday♪ Today's MENU for EMIYA Family Lancer Scenario Pack
